email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this email finds you well.

We are pleased to offer a freight rate for the shipment of 50,000MT of Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai on CIF terms. Our initial freight quote is USD 25 per metric ton.

The vessel we propose is the MV OCEAN HORIZON, with a DWT of 180,000 and LOA of 300m. The laycan is set for 15th to 20th November 2023.

Please let us know your thoughts and if you have any specific requirements.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Could you consider lowering the rate to USD 22 per metric ton?

Also, could you provide details on the demurrage rate and laytime?

Best,
John Doe
Charterers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your response. Considering your feedback, we can offer a revised rate of USD 23 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day, and the laytime is 5 days.

Please let us know if this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the rate of USD 23 per metric ton, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the loading and discharge details?

Best,
John Doe
Charterers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to. Loading will commence on 15th November at Newcastle, and discharge will be at Shanghai by 20th November. The loading window is 24 hours.

Please let us know if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

We are satisfied with the terms and the laycan period. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Thanks,
John Doe
Charterers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers
